1.content: What/Who are you in Megaman's world?
1.title: Welcome to the world, _________.

choices: In rubble, having problems replacing parts with Shin.
11.content:
Name: Daedo
Gender: Male
Species: Machine (Possibly Cyborg)
Weapons: Energy Cannon, Spark Blaster, Ice Ray, Flamethrower, Hadouken rip-off :).
Appearance: Helm appears to look plated but is pulled back similar to a Samurai's head and is removable, and had brown hair underneath. His body is colored black, grey, and has a pattern that glows red on it. Since it is an exoskeleton, he can't remove it. He wears a dark cloak in public.
Bio: Trying to discover if he was once human or not.

------------

He also has a partner he can visit.
Name: Shin
Gender: Female
Species: Cyborg
Weapons: A wrench.
Bio: Took up an interest in mechanics after meeting Daedo.
Appearance: White and pink jumpsuit with a robotic eyepiece.

Where is Daedo now?
11.title: Character #1

111.content:
...*Reboot*...-System Lockdown Imminent-....*Reboot*......-Executing overide.exe-...

Daedo's eyes flickered on only to see flames, smoke and rubble. His vision jolted in and out due to his extensive damage. He felt rubble press against his body. He needed to get it off him, first to push it off. He reached his arms forward and realized his arms were gone, leaving sparking stubs.

Great.

He saw one leg gone and he couldn't move the other. His HUD flashed with more warnings. If he didn't get out soon, he would become a rusty relic. He then heard something through the static in one of his ears.

What was it?
111.title: In rubble, after a fight.

1111.content:
"Hey can your hear me, listen I need you to nod if you can hear me?" This voice sounded posh and strangle to Daedo. Still with all his might he gave a little nod before finally he felt the weight of the rubble lifted off him. He wanted to thank however it was who saved him but his sight began to go.

"Warning! Override function damaged to critical, all systems shut down, shut down. "

Daedo couldn't believe it, was this really the end of him? He couldn't believe he couldn't remember who was fighting? It all a blur. Perhaps this was fate or perhaps he was just very unlucky either way, Daedo could do nothing as slowly his system began to shut down.

This looked to be the end for Daedo, he shut his eyes and could only wish that he made more time to figure it all out. He wanted to live, he had to. Then like his wish had been heard, he felt a blast of electric energy run through his body.

"Back up life core detected. Limited functions sight and voice motions online"

Daedo couldn't believe it, he had been saved but by who? Slowly the answer came to him as he opened his eyes.

For looking down at him was a large, round cyborg cross human looking man covered in white steel plate armour with a bald head, one dark green eye and one very clear fake eye which looked more like a sniper scope sticking out his eye socket.

"Hello can you hear me?" the white human cyborg said waving his left hand in front of Daedo's face.

"Yes" Daedo said weakly. He still could see he had no arms or his one leg he lost.

"Excellent, you must listen I am Doc, a cyborg medic." his rescuer said. "You need to be repaired right away. I was about to retrieve your build data however I need to warn you I will have to use parts I only have able do you understand?

Daedo guessed he didn't have much choose. If he didn't his life core would die as would he. So he nodded allowing Doc to begin work. It'sa hard process for anyone to be rebuilt but Daedo had to admit Doc was quick about it. He managed to put Daedo in a sleep mode causing him less pain then it would but Daedo could still swear he felt the new parts being fitted on.

Still Sparks flew and hours passed till finally Doc had finished. It was he awoke Daedo, who at once..
1111.title: Doc

11112.content:
Daedo sat straight up, when warnings flashed on his HUD, saying he still needed to let the repairs work. He looked over his legs and saw that they looked pretty similar to the armor there before.

His arm was a different story.

He saw patchworked-armor pieced from other armor strewn around the arm. He placed a hand against his head. He laid on an operating tables of sorts in a dark room. He laid back down when a door nearby opened. He then saw the man who saved him enter.

What happens next?
11112.title: Sat up.

choices: No, i'm just a lone machine serching for answers.
111121.content:
"Oh I see your awake." Doc says noting the fact that Daedo looked straight at him. The Cyborg human proceeded to walk over to the right side of the bed where Daedo rested rebuilt arm.

"I must say your quite the strange one" Doc said to Daedo, who was still feeling a little rough. "Your the first machine I've worked on who is swear could feel what I was doing, tell me are you ok if I ask you some question Daedo?"

Daedo didn't see why not after all, this cyborg had saved his life so he could answer a few questions. With that he gave a nod to Doc, who at once asked.

"I need to ask where you got your weapons from? Your one very High-Tec machine to have all this, where you perhaps in the army or some secret agent working for the government?

Daelo could see Doc real eye almost shine with anticipation to know the answer. It was almost as if he wanted him to be a government or army machine. However was he?
111121.title: Doc asks Daedo some questions

1111212.content:
Daedo's put a head to his hand. "No...At least I don't think so. I was found by one one of my friends. Maybe I was...I just don't know..." Daedo sighed and looked back at Doc. "What about you?"

What happens next?
1111212.title: No, i'm just a lone machine serching for an...

11112121.content:
"Oh well.." Doc seemed hesitate to answer Daedo's question. But after taking a few breath he continued to say.

"I'm just your everyday ex-medical cyborg from the militarily. Discarded like many before me because I couldn't keep my mind on the job you know?"

However as much as Daedo wanted to understand where Doc was coming from he couldn't. In fact, a lot of stuff wasn't clear at this point. Still what he did know was the cyborg who saved him Doc was part of the military but now isn't because he couldn't keep his mind on his job.

"Why, if you don't mind me asking? Couldn't you keep your mind on your job Doc?" Daedo asked still holding his head. Noticing this, Doc returned to Daedo with a small hand held scanner. As he began to scan Daedo's head he said.

"To answer your question Daedo, I felt like I wasn't going anywhere. All day repairing the robotic soldiers of war,sometimes using the parts of a deactivated solider to fix another. It was all the same day in, day out and my mind grew bored. I tell you there is nothing interesting about a solider who had his arm blasted off or his leg being blown off, it's all simple patch work any cyborg with two wires to the head could do."

It was then Doc fell quiet. Perhaps he had shared to much about his idea's as for the rest of the scan he fell quiet before walking away with the scanner.

"You seem to having some problems, but nothing serious." Doc said with his back to the sitting Daedo. "Your free to leave whenever you want and have no worries about thanking me for the fix. It was nice to actually have to work for a change."

From his tone of voice, Daedo could sense something about Doc but what it was didn't know. Still now fixed and ready to roll out, Daedo slid off the table before...
11112121.title: Doc's Story

111121212.content:
Daedo caught Doc in the next room after he slid off the table. A few pieces felt odd to him as he walked toward Doc, but he knew he'd get used to it. "Hey, thanks again for patching me up." Daedo slid his hands into his pockets. Now what will he do?

"If you don't mind me asking, what will you do now Doc?"
111121212.title: Thanking Doc

1111212121.content:
Doc looked back at Daedo as he packs away the equipment. He was surprised he stayed around after all most machines usually have something to do.

"Well I guess I'll go back to studying." Doc answered calmly continuing to pack up his tools.

"My time in the military informed me of a practise where humans could be turned into Cyborgs. Can you imagine being a fragile, free willed being only then to be turned into a machine? Some may see this as improving on humans life saying it could give a powerless man the only he needs to fight for himself.

However, even as a Cyborg I wonder that perhaps a practise like this could also be used for criminal purposes giving powerful men who have too much power even more. Is such a practise helping or hindering our world? And of course,the question I personally would like to know is what effects this practise has on human. Does it make them strong or does it in fact make their bodies weaker? And what about the mind? Does being a cyborg/human hybrid make the cyborg sharper in combat making them the ultimate solider? Could this practise be creating what I dare say a advanced human being?

Doc seemed to be a little lost in his thoughts and Daedo just stood there waiting till finally Doc returned from his thoughts.

"Ah I'm sorry. Start me off on super hybrid humans and I go off on one like a mother hen" Doc said happily. Still it was then something hit Doc. He had been talking to Daedo a lot however he still had no idea what he was doing here? He had no idea what job role he did? Or where he came from?

"Tell me Daedo." Doc said finally closing up his tool box now filled with his tools.

"What are you going to do now your repaired? Go off in search of your attackers? Return to whatever you do? I ask because I hope you might consider taking it easy until you feel ready to use your arm again. I've done this many times and I know many machines suffer from rejection of parts making them weak and open to any rouge machines out there as well as other unkind cyborgs.

I ask you only as a concerned medical trained Cyborg, what are you going to do now?"
1111212121.title: Doc answers

11112121211.content:
Daedo scratched his head, "Well...I really don't have anywhere to go. I have a friend named Shin I visit, but now I'm curious. I don't remember who I was, if I were anyone. As you may have known, I'm a machine, but I need to know something. I want to know if I'm just robot, pieced together in a manufacturing plant, or if I was human before. Could I tag along with you?"

Does Doc let him?
11112121211.title: Daedo's answer

111121212111.content:
"Hmm, well I guess until we find out a little more about you it would be ok. But perhaps we should get you to your friend, shar, sher, shun,"

It seemed Doc was having a hard time remembering the name of Daedo's friend until he was corrected by Daedo, who told him her name was Shin.

"Ah yes, Shin. Well at least you remember a name, this is a good start to your lack of memory you display."

This seemed rather rude to Daedo however he could forgive Doc as the cyborg did seem to be a few bolt short in the common sense department. Yet what the machine found quite strange was Doc packing up a small bag together with parts as well as his tool of trade.

"Doc what are doing?" Daedo asks. Still lost about why he was packing a bag. Doc reply however sounded along the line of.

"Well since there is a chance one might run into more rouge bots, I figured that we might need to bring it to them so we must be prepared."

It seemed Doc was expecting something and he sounded a little too excited about it. Still with them all pack and their systems online. They...
111121212111.title: To Shin's

1111212121111.content:
Shin's place didn't look my much. In fact, it looked like nothing at all. Daedo and Doc approached the place when Daedo knocked and entered, Doc a little ways behind him. He was the lucky one, due to what happened next.

"Daedo!" A female voice rang. A girl, 16 or 17, ran over to him and hugged him. Due to him still adjusting to his new leg, he fell over.

"Ow! Shin!" Daedo responded. The girl picked him up and dusted each other off.

"Sorry...huh?" Shin began when she saw Doc standing there. Before more confusion erupted, Daedo explained the situation.

Shin nodded. "Alright, go ahead I guess."

What's Doc's reaction?
1111212121111.title: Made their way to Shin's

choices: Other choices Shin or Daelo make.
11112121211111.content:
Doc would have reacted quicker if he was not busy looking over Shin's place. The huge garage like building seem to be far from civilisation. With it's bright red roof,cream outside walls and a huge metal made garage door it was hard for Doc not to think back to his military days were buildings yet the one Shin seemed to be living in was used as a base to repair broken machines and cyborgs.

"Hey are you ok?" Shin asked kindly, waving her small metal hand in front of Doc's face. The movement brought Doc back from his thoughts to which he answered back.

"Oh yes, my apologies miss shin is it?" Doc asked. Even in a world like this it was possible for cyborg to be married or even dating. Shin nodded explaining she's more of a cyborg who like to get her hands dirty with a wrench then with another cyborg.

At this Doc let out an awkward laugh hiding his embarrassment about what Shin had just said.

Daelo and Shin just looked at him confused before Doc stopped to introduced him.

"Ah hum, I am Doc. It is a pleasure to meet you miss Shin."

The female cyborg nodded telling Doc he didn't have to call her miss as it made her feel old. With a nod Doc promised he would not.

"All right then, umm perhaps we should go into my workshop to talk?" Shin said pressing a small red button on the left side of the garage door. "After all there's no point standing out in the open right?"

Daelo and Doc agreed and with that as the garage door slowly opened the three of them made their way inside before Shin closed the garage door behind them.

Now inside Doc was a little surprised to see the single area had been spilt in into smaller area. In the far left a small white coloured kitchen had been built, while to the far right a small living room with a black sofa, a small tv sat while the rest of the area was built like a workshop with parts of cyborgs, car parts as well as old technology from the past scattered about along with tools and half built items.

"Sorry about the mess" Shin said leading them both through the workshop area. "I've been working on something I think will change the world forever."

It was at this Daelo whispered to Doc that Shin always said that about everything she makes. Doc figured that from the amount of unfinished creations laying about doing nothing. Still as they moved and jumped over bits and bobs of the workshop they finally arrived at the far end of the garage where the kitchen and living room where situated.

Shin invited them both to sit down on the sofa and without even hesitation Daelo did, however Doc was a little more careful feeling the seat he about to sit on in case of you left over tools. After a minute of searching everything seemed ok and he sat before finally Shin appeared again with a small wooden stool. She placed it beside the end where Daelo sat and then took a seat.

It all fell a bit quiet from there until Shin broke it by saying. "So Doc thanks for helping Daelo out, he gets into all kind of trouble."

Doc nodded before asking Shin if she would mind telling him what she knew about Daelo after all they seemed to be close plus he was getting no answers from Daelo himself due to perhaps memory loss caused by the attack.

Shin sat there for a moment, thinking before finally.....
11112121211111.title: Meet and greet

111121212111111.content:
Shin began talking to Doc. "That's the thing. He's always had this memory loss, it wasn't just before the attack...I set up a repair shop out here so I wouldn't have to go far to find things to build. Then I found Daedo. His limbs were gone and circuits were hanging out of him, but he was still working. I carried him back here and laid him down. He had become my project for the week."

Shin sat down and continued. "When I found him, his condition showed he had been there for at least more than a week. But he was awake the whole time. I'd come in to try and make measurements to see how the limbs should be, and he would look back at me. His vocal generator was damaged so he couldn't move. It was weird...but it felt nice not to be alone. I'd just sit along with him, waiting for another part to come. When I finally repaired his vocals, he asked who I was, and where he was. I told him, then asked where he was from. He wasn't able to answer that. I checked his databanks, his memory was cleaned out. All he knew was what things were, and his name. I've let him stay here since. Then he heard about processes that changed humans to machines, and can't stop thinking if that's what he was."

Shin leaned in a little closer to Doc to say something quiet enough that Daedo couldn't pick up. "He says he was dreams, but....It doesn't make sense..."

What happens next?
111121212111111.title: Shin's talks about Daelo

choices: A group of lightly armoured cyborgs armed with small energy guns
A single heavy armed cyborg with a huge enegry gun
1111212121111111.content:
It was clear to Doc that Daelo had been in the position he found him in long before they met. Still if that was the case why? Why was he almost being destroyed but not being deactivated. This all was very worrying but not as what was about to happen. As the three settled down again there was a sudden loud noise from the garage door they all just in time to see an energy shot blast through the door hitting on of Shin's unfinished works.

The work piece flew into pieces and all three rose.

"Ah, I think you may have more guests Shin," Doc said as another shot came through the door. This was no time to relax and with that the three of them geared up for battle. Shim armed herself with her wrench, Daelo powered up his weapons and Doc armed himself with a pair of small metal hammers. It was time to fight and as Shin opened the garage door the three were greeted by...
1111212121111111.title: Attack attack

11112121211111112.content:
Pushing down the garage door, was a large robotic being. It was about 7-8 feet tall, it's head fashioned to look like a skull and adorned in white and black armor. It held a large energy gun near it's waist with both hands as it pointed the barrel upwards. Daedo saw that Shin's wrench might not do a thing to it. "Shin, just get back. This thing looks too tough for just a wrench."

Shin nodded and soon fled and hid behind something in the shop. The cyborg charged up a shot and fired at Daedo, who rolled out of the way and fired back with rapid energy shots, the rounds just clattering against it's armor as it ignored the shots and fired again. This time Daedo was knocked into a pile of metal parts as they collapsed on top of him, burying him underneath.

What happens next?
11112121211111112.title: A single heavy armed cyborg with a huge enegry gun

111121212111111121.content:
It was then Doc's turn to attack, he charged at the cyborg before smashing both of his metal hammers into the cyborg right thick arm. However the large robotic being just looked at the hammers which were stopped by it thick armour. With no chance to escape, Doc received a smack to the gut with the butt of the huge gun before the robotic being booted Doc back into the sofa with a powerful right boot.

Shin who was still hiding couldn't believe such a power being existed. Most Cyborgs and machine could be taken down with a few good strike and shots but this huge being was like a unstoppable force with enough firepower to destroy a small town. Still she wasn't about to like it destroy her workshop and armed with her wrench she charged at the being.

Both Doc and Daleo could only watch as the girl cyborg swung her wrench at the being which again endured the hit before....
111121212111111121.title: Doc fights

1111212121111111212.content:
Daedo felt that his body itself was disconnected from the system in his brain, making him unable to move. Daedo struggled under the weight when he saw the man swing the gun and hit Shin, knocking her into something and being followed with a thud. With that he lifted his head to see when more parts buried him underneath, leaving him immobile and unable to see.

------

The cyborg lumbered for a few moments before moving to one side of the room toward what appreared to be filing cabinets. It grabbed a whole one after searching and turned it's back and burst out a window, disappearing and cloaking, leaving the three downed.
1111212121111111212.title: Knocking Shin aside

choices: Shin tell him what was in the cabinet
She says she can't tell him.
11112121211111112121.content:
It took a while but finally after a while, the three machines were up once again. With Shin repairing her hurt friend Doc took a look around at the destruction the being had caused. Shin's home was a mess with parts flung everywhere and energy shot holes all over the house yet the only thing that looked like it had been raided was the missing metal cabinet near the edge of the work-shop.

It was clear that there was something in that cabinet and taking the whole thing too meant that perhaps it required the whole thing. Still there was only one person who knew that answer and after Daelo was functioning again the three sat down again on the sofa before Doc asked Shin what was in the cabinet? She didn't answer at first and it seemed she didn't want to. However after Daelo repeated the question to her, she looked at him and he looked back at her with a calm look in his eyes.

"Shin what was in the cabinet?" he asks. Shin looks back at her friend before...
11112121211111112121.title: Recovery

111121212111111121211.content:
Shin sighed. "That cabinet had the file I made on you when I found you. It listed weapons, armor, date, reactions..." Shin said. "Whoever took the cabinet may be after you." Shin said.

Daedo sighed as she stood up. "Let's go. It's not safe here."

Shin agreed immediately, packing her things. Daedo found a dump where they could hide in what was a very old trailer stuck under a mound of garbage in a landfill.

What happens next?
111121212111111121211.title: Shin tell him what was in the cabinet

1111212121111111212112.content:
It was as all this all went down that Doc told them both to hold on. The two machines stopped where they were and looked at Doc. From where he stood Doc could see Shin poking her head out from behind her rough look sofa while Daedo had taken point near the bullet ridden garage door ready to open it and leave.

"I must be deaf but where and what are we doing?" Doc asked trying to get an idea of what was going on. It all had happened so fast he couldn't keep up with it.

Shin then piping up told Doc that Daedo knew of a dump where she first found him. "However" she said looking at Doc Cyborgs body parts. "You may not want to come with us since its near the base of..." She fell quiet all of a sudden. Perhaps something inside of him click but suddenly said "It doesn't matter."

Shin looked at her friend a little shocked after she knew that if Doc was an Ex medical cyborg then he might be...

"Don't jump to conclusions Shin" Daedo said looking at her. He somehow knew what she was thinking but he didn't want to label Doc just yet. After all the cyborg had saved his life and now here they stood ready to accuse him of being...

"Something the matter?" Doc asked disturbing Daedo's thoughts. Daedo shook his head before opening the garage door. It was then the conversation fell quiet as the three now got ready to leave. Shin now popped back behind the sofa before bringing out a rough look tool bag she then went around her garage picking up and down tools deciding what to take.

However outside the garage Doc and Daedo now stood waiting. They were quiet as they stared out to the bare roads and tree around Shin building till finally Doc spoke. "Shin believe me to be a Maverick."

At this Daelo sighed. He guessed Doc had figured out what they were trying to avoid.

"I'm sorry Doc, but you maybe one." Daelo said calmly keeping his eye sight down. It was at this Doc let out a small laugh before admitting he had been called such a thing since he left the military and perhaps he was. "After all" he began.

"I left the human army behind because I thought I could do better perhaps that makes me one I don't know."

The two fell silent again yet in Daelo mind he felt torn. Something in his head was telling him to kill Doc, as a maverick he put a lot of risk not only himself but Shin if he suddenly turned on them and with one simple shot it that won't matter. However something else told Dealo that this cyborg had saved his life and helped when they were attacked. What Maverick does that?

The two ideas spun around and around in his head till finally Dealo makes up his mind.
1111212121111111212112.title: Doc's opinion

choices: Hunt down the machine they attacked them
11112121211111112121122.content:
Daedo trusted Doc. He did save him after all. "It's alright Shin. I don't think Doc's Maverick. His actions seem to say he isn't, at least." Shin nodded.

"Alright, let's go then." Shin said as the three reached the location. It was a small scrap shed buried under mounds of scraps. Daedo and Doc pushed through the scraps to get inside. Inside was a torn sofa, a mattress, and a workbench. After settling in, they decided to...
11112121211111112121122.title: Stay his weapon

1112.content:
Name: Smoke
Gender: Male
Affiliation: Maverick Hunter
Weaponry: Smoke Bomb, retractable riot shield.
Attacks: Riot Kick, Smoke Screen, Smoke Bomb.
Appearance: Stand six feet tall even. Has black/ armor along with gas mask helmet that has red eyepieces. Has a radio in his transceiver along with a Tactical vest. Has a shoulder-mounted cannon. Has a folding riot shield on back but can easily attatch to either arm.
Background: Built to quell dangerous situations such as riots. Viewed as a possible asset to the Maverick Hunters.

Smoke checked his mask then the rest of his gear as the small helicopter dropped him off before leaving. He took cover behind a building and tapping his radio, " This is Hotel, checking radio communication." After a few a feminine voice responded. " I hear you loud and clear. I'm Acqua your Navigator. First I don't want you flying blind, I'm picking up a distress beacon in the rubble half a block true north."

When he got to the beacon he found a heavily damaged cyborg among the carnage. Daedo then.
1112.title: Another character

12.content:
Name: John Bonne.


Age: 18.


Gender: Male.


Appearance: John is a human who has white skin, long black hair that ends at his rear, and natural dark purple eyes. He normally wares a dark green button up shirt underneath a brown trench coat. He also wares pants of the same color as his coat, a long black belt he loops twice around his waist to create an X shape, and black cowboy boots. And lastly, he wares an eye-patch over his left eye, and he also carries a single six shooter with him. (Though he rarely uses it, he finds it comforting to hold onto).


While on important missions such as acquiring large Refractors and/or fighting off a certain pesky 'blue guy', He'll outfit himself in his own custom Diggers gear. (It looks a lot like Black Zero's outfit, though it has a touch of sky pirate in it as well). It comes equipped with a shield attached to the left hand that projects a round barrier around the user and never runs out of energy. (Though John never uses it unless his or other people's lives would be put in danger).


It also has a purple beam saber attached to his right hand that can deflect, split, or even absorb most energy based attacks. And for those times when close quarters just isn't going to cut it, he also has duel rocket pods that can pop out from both of his shoulders at will and fire a near infinite stream of penny sized homing missiles. (Though they are small, in numbers they can inflict a large amount of damage very quickly).


In addition to all those sweet features, the suit also comes equipped with a dash function to easily dodge oncoming attacks, or make close quarters easier. And lastly, it has a one time only teleport function that must be reinstalled every time John returns to base.


Personality: Even though John is a Sky Pirate, he still has a sense of justice and believes that no one should be harmed during a raid or Dig unless someone or something attacks him or his family/friends first.


Even in combat he believes that it should always be made a fair fight, and will even provide tips, weapons, and restorative items to people who don't stand a chance against him, whenever he can.


But just because he won't attack first unless provoked, and just because he'll help you out if you really need it, doesn't mean he won't steal from you whenever he gets the chance. He's still a Bonne, and he's still going to preform his job regardless.


History: The story of John Bonne started on a small island where he was an orphan, and had no recollection of his parents. He lived out his days just trying to survive each day as best as he could. Though it was a peaceful little island, most of the villagers were still a little aggressive from poor harvests and little to no sea trade, and usually took out their anger on anyone weaker than them. And this included the orphan kids.


When one bright sunny afternoon, when John was running from one such villager with a wooden stick, he stumbled into a hidden cave and fell into a fissure. The villager thought he had died from the fall and decided to leave him there to rot. But little did the villager know, not only did John survive the fall, but he landed in a giant underground lake, filled to the brim with giant Refractors of many different colors. Some were even multicolored as well. And one, bigger than the rest, was a rainbow Refractor with angel wings. It was the most amazing thing He'd ever seen. And no doubt the most amazing thing any Digger would ever see.


After exploring the cave for a while longer, John found a passage on the mountainside that lead him back down to the village path. But when the boy returned to the village, he found that it was overrun by a group of Sky Pirates calling themselves, The Bonnes. He was captured upon entering the village and was brought forth to the center of the village with all the other villagers they could find.


They questioned the village elders first, demanding they tell them where the treasure of the island was hidden. But no one told them anything except that they knew nothing. Tired of waiting for answers, The Bonnes decided to burn the whole island to the ground and Dig up the remains. Startled by their decision, John shouted--


"I know where the treasure is! I've seen it! It's in a cave not far from here. I can take you there. But i have conditions that must be met first." The leader of the Bonnes, Teisel Bonne, listened to his terms, that first, the Bonnes would adopt him into their family and take him with them. And second, John would be made the family accountant, and would be put in charge of spending limits for the Bonnes operations. Teisel, though reluctant to leaving this boy in charge of their money, agreed to his terms. And thus, the story of John's life as a Bonne, began.


Author note



And that's the bio of my Character, i hope you enjoy playing as him as much as i will. Now let's decide on the timeline for our story, shall we?
12.title: The Misadventures of John Bonne

choices: Take a break and go vist Tron
122.content: Today was another slow day for me. I got up, got dressed, cleaned myself up, ate breakfast, did some small chores, and started calculating all our account info, loans, stock, how much supplies we had, how long we could live until we needed more, how much it would cost to go out and buy more, where we could buy it the cheapest, etc. The normal things i always do. To tell you the truth, i hated it. I despised working all the time non stop looking over paper after paper after paper about how much money we made from that last bank robbery, or how many Refractors we found in that last Dig. I didn't think taking care of our own expenses would be so boring. At the time, when i showed them that cave and became a member of The Bonne Pirate family, i thought I'd have a little more freedom with what we spent. But now, the only thing i want to do more than anything is to go out, out into the world and go on a Dig of my own. Go out and rob a bank and make it big. Go out and just have fun with my life as a Sky Pirate. It was so dull being left all by myself on this ass boring ship. Luckily however, i wasn't the only one who was thinking the same way. Well, more or less the same way anyway.
122.title: The Misadventures of Tron (and John) Bonne

choices: "John? Sorry, busy with something. Come back later."
No response. Though the door is unlocked.
1221.content:
After about an hour of working, i decided to take a short break and see how my sister Tron was doing. Probably one of two things. Either she was tinkering with another gadget of hers, or she was busy setting one of the Serverbots on fire. She enjoyed doing that whenever she was stressed or if one of them didn't do the job they were given. Sometimes i wondered if she ever got off to any of that stuff.


In any case, getting my mind out of the gutter, i made my way to her room and knocked on the door.


"Hey Sis! You in here?"
1221.title: Take a break and go vist Tron

choices: "Go tell me what?" Teisel says as he walks in
"He's out on a dig right now. But we can tell him when he get's back."
12211.content:
I opened the door to Tron's room. She was inside sitting on her bed just looking at the far wall before she looked at me entering.


"Hey John. What's up? Why are you here?" Tron asked confused, no doubt wondering why i was off duty.


"Oh, I'm just tired of my life as an accountant. That's all." I said as i sat down beside her with my head hung.


"Huh? Why? Isn't that what you wanted when you joined us?"


"Well yeah, but to be honest, at the time i thought i would have a little more freedom with the money i found that day. But the only thing you guys used it on was to help build this ship and create your equipment. A lot went into those things, and all i could do was keep a log of everything bought. I guess what I'm trying to say is, i never planed for all of this to happen."


"Then what did you plan on happening? Waiting until we had our backs turned to you so you could run off with everything yourself?" Tron sounded concerned as she looked my way with an upset look in her eyes.


"No. I could never do something like that to you guys. You took me in during my time of need and took care of me even though we're not blood relatives. You guys got off that godforsaken island and i owe you my life, really. It's just, i never thought things through hard enough, and now i just want to do something different with my life as a Bonne."


"Really? Like what?"


"Well, i was thinking something along the lines of you guys training me how to fight, and perhaps even building me something to go out on digs and such."


"Heh, you? Going out on a dig? I can already see that happening. Teisel rarely let's me go out on missions with him as it is. What chance do you think you'll have when i can't even go out, and I'm his second in command and sister?"


"Well, perhaps we could try to convince him together? It might work if we really plead with him long enough."


"Well, i guess we could give it a shot. But talking him into it is one thing, building you your own set of Digger's gear and training you how to use it are two different things entirely. Do you even know how long it would take for us to do that?"


"I know sis, but i really want to learn. It doesn't help my case any if everyone on the ship knows how to fight except me. How am i going to protect myself if i have nothing to protect myself with when i need to protect myself?"


"Hmm. I see your point. Well, at the very least, we could try to convince Teisel to train you how to fight, should the need arise. And we could even build you a suit in case we needed backup."


"Alright, then let's go tell Teisel now Tron."
12211.title: "John? Yeah, come in."

info.brief_description: Create your own Megaman character and put him or her in his world.
info.description:
Create your character and add him to Megaman's world. This is also meant for authors to communicate with other authors. This is something that has allowed me to know se great writers, like lol, Sentinel, PanzerSherman, and IrishSpartan. Now, a few rules:

1. Don't control stories when you're co-oping with other authors.
2. Have fun.
